}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The Netgear ReadyNAS 3138 is a 1U rack-mounted NAS server with 4 3.5'' SATA drive slots.
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/GPL/ReadyNASOS_WW_src_V6.10.5.zip Latest GPL Source]
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== {{/Serial info}}
==Notes== ===Memory=== The NAS is an ordinary Intel PC with the motherboard hosting two DDR3 SDRAM slots supporting up to 16 GB in total of DDR3-1600 (PC3-12800) memory. The maximum size of a single modules seems to be limited to 8 GB.
Additionally the mainboard contains two unpopulated SATA connectors which can be used to install additional two SFF hard disks:
[[File:Netgear-RN3138-Extra 2 SFF disks.jpg|600px|center]]
===Power Supply===
The power supply is an FSP GROUP GSP180-50LH. The power rails provided are:
{| class="wikitable" |+ Power Supply voltage rails |- ! +3.3V !! +5V !! +12V !! +5Vsb !! -12V |- | 10.0A || 14.0A || 10.0A || 2.5A || 0.3A |}
+3.3V and +5V can source 80W maximum in total. The maximum total continuous output power is 180W.
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:RN3138 02.png| File:RN3138 01.png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Netgear-RN3138-mainboard1.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
== Mods == A number of mods has been documented for this device, see "Mods" here: https://pop.fsck.pl/hardware/netgear-rn3138.html
[[Category:English Documentation]]
